title: Let’s scatter beans!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Hey, today is Setsubun right. Maki-chan, do you scatter beans at your place?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>We did it when I was little. But now not anymore.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>But I guess….we do eat according to our age<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Is that so? Alright then, this year let’s get everyone to do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh…..? It’s not like I want to do it or anything….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>But it’s been a long time, why not try it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’ll go get everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ah, wait….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Sigh….I guess it can’t be helped. I’ll go along with it just for today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
